ipapi 0.1.0
  • Reference

Get information about IP Addresses

query_ips.Rd

Return detailed information from a vector of IP addresses.

Usage

query_ips(ips)

Arguments

ips

a character vector of IP addresses. Must not contain NA values.

Value

A data.frame with columns

  • ip: character

  • isp: character

  • asn: character

  • org: character

  • country: character

  • country_code: character

  • city: character

  • state: character

  • zipcode: character

  • latitude: numeric

  • longitude: numeric

  • timezone: character

  • localtime: character

  • is_mobile: logical

  • is_vpn: logical

  • is_tor: logical

  • is_proxy: logical

  • is_datacenter: logical

  • risk_score: integer

References

See API Reference

Examples


# Only run this example when internet is present
if (rlang::is_installed("curl")) {
  if (curl::has_internet()) {
    query_ips("1.1.1.1")
  }
}
#>        ip     asn              org              isp   country country_code
#> 1 1.1.1.1 AS13335 Cloudflare, Inc. Cloudflare, Inc. Australia           AU
#>     city           state zipcode  latitude longitude         timezone
#> 1 Sydney New South Wales    1001 -33.85455  151.2002 Australia/Sydney
#>             localtime is_mobile is_vpn is_tor is_proxy is_datacenter risk_score
#> 1 2025-01-02T18:50:43     FALSE  FALSE  FALSE    FALSE          TRUE          0
